rules_text:
Trample
[i]Even Better[/i] – If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates that many of those tokens plus one instead.
[i]Grisly Wound[/i] – Whenever a modified creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, that creature deals 2 damage to that player.
Partner with Hayato, Young Onmyoji [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Hayato into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
